strapiPost.title: NWA High Schools Nationally Recognized
strapiPost.content:
The latest U.S. News & World Report high school rankings, put two Arkansas high schools in the top 100 in the U.S. Several other high schools across the state ranked among the top 1,000 U.S. high schools.

Haas Hall Academy in Fayetteville topped the list at No. 1 in the state and ranked No. 50 in the country among high schools. Haas Hall Academy Bentonville was the No.2 high school in Arkansas and ranked No. 80 nationally.

Other schools that received attention - Bentonville High School and Rogers New Technology High School which were in the top five high schools in the state.

Didn't see your school? Find the full list HERE.
